All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AssetSetter
The AssetSetter class is responsible for setting up game assets such as points, hearts, and NPCs.
Blinky
The Blinky class represents the Blinky ghost in the game.
CollisionChecker
The CollisionChecker class is responsible for checking collisions between entities and other objects within the game world.
Entity
The Entity class represents a generic entity in the game.
GamePanel
GamePanel class is responsible for the main game screen and game loop.
Heart
The Heart class represents a heart object in the game, extending the generic superObject class.
KeyHandler
The KeyHandler class handles keyboard input for the game.
Main
 
Pinky
The Pinky class represents the Pinky enemy character in the game.
Player
The Player class represents the player-controlled character in the game.
Point
The Point class represents a point object in the game, extending the generic superObject class.
Screens
 
superObject
The superObject class represents a generic object within the game.
Tile
Represents a tile in the game background.
TileManager
The TileManager class manages the tiles used for the game background.
